name: Technical Consulting
summary: Strategic technology consulting for informed decisions. System architecture, technology selection, digital transformation, and IT strategy development.

seo.title: Technical Consulting Services | CodeX Terminal
seo.description: Expert technology consulting for architecture design, digital transformation, and strategic IT decisions. CTO-level guidance for growing businesses.

hero.headline: Strategic Technical Consulting
hero.subheadline: Make informed technology decisions with expert guidance and strategic planning
hero.description: From system architecture design to digital transformation roadmaps, we provide CTO-level expertise to help businesses make smart technology investments and build scalable solutions.

features.title: System Architecture Design
features.description: Design scalable, maintainable system architectures that support your business growth and technical requirements.

features.title: Technology Stack Selection
features.description: Choose the right technologies, frameworks, and tools based on your specific needs, budget, and long-term goals.

features.title: Digital Transformation Strategy
features.description: Develop comprehensive digital transformation roadmaps that modernize your business processes and technology infrastructure.

features.title: Code Review & Quality Assessment
features.description: Evaluate existing codebases, identify technical debt, and provide actionable recommendations for improvement.

features.title: Performance Optimization
features.description: Identify bottlenecks, optimize system performance, and implement scalability improvements for better user experience.

features.title: Security & Compliance Audit
features.description: Assess security posture, identify vulnerabilities, and ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations.

services.name: Technology Assessment
services.description: Comprehensive evaluation of your current technology stack, infrastructure, and development processes with improvement recommendations.

services.name: Architecture Planning
services.description: Design microservices architecture, API strategies, database design, and cloud infrastructure for scalable applications.

services.name: Team & Process Optimization
services.description: Improve development workflows, implement best practices, and optimize team productivity with modern DevOps practices.

services.name: Vendor Selection & Integration
services.description: Evaluate and select third-party services, APIs, and tools that align with your technical and business requirements.

services.name: Compliance & Risk Management
services.description: Ensure GDPR, HIPAA, SOC2 compliance and implement security best practices to protect your business and customers.

services.name: Startup CTO Services
services.description: Fractional CTO services for startups including technical leadership, team building, and product development strategy.

process.title: Current State Analysis
process.description: Evaluate existing systems, processes, and team capabilities to understand your current technology landscape.

process.title: Requirements Gathering
process.description: Define business objectives, technical requirements, constraints, and success criteria for the consulting engagement.

process.title: Strategic Planning
process.description: Develop comprehensive recommendations, roadmaps, and implementation strategies tailored to your specific needs.

process.title: Implementation Support
process.description: Provide hands-on support during implementation phases with guidance, code reviews, and progress monitoring.

process.title: Knowledge Transfer
process.description: Ensure your team understands the new systems and processes through documentation, training, and ongoing support.

benefits: Access to senior-level expertise without full-time hire
